attributes.action: Stop the badman report affecting home education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Badman report takes away the right of parents to home educate their children with out overshadowing from state controlled monitors who are against Home Education. 
It is our right to home educate without such monitoring and give notice we will not co-operate with the report if brought into law

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
